attributes.action: Legislate to protect the delivery of NHS Dental Services
attributes.additional_details: U.K. Dentists are seemingly unwilling to provide NHS services with most switching to the more profitable Private Sector and it is fast becoming a national health emergency. Make it a legal obligation on all Dentists who wish to train and/or be granted a licence to practice Dentistry in the U.K. to provide a minimum level of services to NHS Patients.
attributes.background: To explore all available options, including legislation to enable all U.K. citizens have access to NHS Dental Services facilitated by changes to the licence to Practice Dentistry within the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open on this issue, which you might like to sign:

Change the law to guarantee NHS dental care for residents in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638133
